actor-start.eventDescription: Flat fee for initiating an Actor run.

list-request.eventDescription: Charge for fetching lists (e.g., tools/list, resources/list).

tool-request.eventDescription: Fallback charge for unclassified or generic tool calls.

match-business.eventDescription: Find companies by name, domain, or business ID.

fetch-businesses.eventDescription: Get detailed firmographics, technographics, and business intelligence.

fetch-businesses-statistics.eventDescription: Access business statistics, e.g., funding history or growth signals.

fetch-businesses-events.eventDescription: Track business events like funding rounds, office changes, hiring trends.

match-prospects.eventDescription: Search for professionals and contacts within companies.

fetch-prospects.eventDescription: Fetch professional contact information and profiles.

fetch-prospects-events.eventDescription: Track prospect-related events like role changes or career milestones.

fetch-prospects-statistics.eventDescription: Access professional profile statistics and insights.

enrich-prospects.eventDescription: Enrich professional contact information, work history, and profiles.

autocomplete.eventDescription: Provides auto-completion suggestions for search queries.

web-search.eventDescription: Performs a general web search to find relevant information.
